com.maingame.game.states

Class DemoPlayState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maingame.game.states.State
      • com.maingame.game.states.PlayState
        • com.maingame.game.states.DemoPlayState

  • public class DemoPlayState
extends PlayState
    This class handles the playstate for the Demo version of the game - no input, and the player boat moves by itself.
